tool.name: OrthoMCL Blast Parser
tool.description: Parse an NCBI BLAST tabular output file into the tabular format required by OrthoMCL

param.name: ncbi_blast_file
param.label: NCBI BLAST tabular output:
param.help: An NCBI BLAST tabular output file

validator.message: Only letters, numbers, spaces and dashes are allowed in the name.
Please restrict the name to 100 characters or less.

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool parses NCBI BLAST tabular output (24 columns) to the simpler format required by OrthoMCL.
